knimeNode.name: Moving Average
knimeNode.shortDescription: Adds a column with moving average values.

fullDescription.intro: This node calculates the moving average of a column. The moving average values are displayed in a new column appended at the end of the table.
fullDescription.option: Select the input column containing double values on which to perform the moving average.
Moving Average can be simple or exponential (used in financial analysis).
The number of samples to include in the moving average window. It has to be an odd number. Minimum value: 3 samples. Maximum Value: Time Series length.

ports.outPort: Table with appended column holding moving average values.
